entry.def: Planking is wood that has been cut into long flat pieces. It is used especially to make floors.

means.word_mean: 1. planks collectively; a quantity of planks
2. (nautical) a covering or flooring constructed of planks (as on a ship)
3. the work of covering an area with planks

auth_sentence.content: They clattered over the wooden planking of a bridge.
